courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for both CS 242 and CS 126. Prerequisite: CS 125. For majors only.
description: Fundamental principles and techniques of software development. Design, documentation, testing, and debugging software, with a significant emphasis on code review. Credit is not given for both CS 242 and CS 126. Prerequisite: CS 125. For majors only.
label: Software Design Studio
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Computer Science or Statistics & Computer Science or Math & Computer Science or Computer Sci & Anthropology or Computer Sci & Astronomy or Computer Sci & Chemistry or Computer Sci & Linguistics major(s). Restricted to Undergrad - Urbana-Champaign.
